author: Dave Michaels
title: Patchy Bitcoin Oversight Poses Hazards for Investors, Regulators Say
text:
U.S. regulators on Tuesday said Congress should consider expanding federal oversight of bitcoin and other cryptocurrency trading, as market cops amplify alarms about an asset class that is largely exempt from investor-protection laws.
The chairmen of the Securities and Exchange Commission and the Commodity Futures Trading Commission told senators that cryptocurrency trading has outgrown the state-based regulation that covers many platforms.
